definition: visible, combination of lenses at the viewing end of optical instruments
details:
adjective
- visible
- relating to or using sight
= example: relating to or using sight
= synonyms: optical
- of or relating to or resembling the eye
= example: of or relating to or resembling the eye
= synonyms: optical
noun
- combination of lenses at the viewing end of optical instruments
= synonyms: eyepiece
